scripts.check:js: pnpm run check:compliance && pnpm run check:versions && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build:js && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test:js
scripts.check:native: pnpm run fetch:cspice && pnpm -C packages/backend-node run build:native && pnpm run stage:native-platform && pnpm run build && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test
scripts.build: turbo run build && pnpm -C packages/tspice run build:dist-publish
scripts.typecheck: turbo run build --filter=@rybosome/tspice-backend-contract && turbo run typecheck
scripts.test:native: pnpm run fetch:cspice && pnpm -C packages/backend-node run build:native && pnpm run stage:native-platform && pnpm run test
